TopicTitle: [Resolved] Launcher not working anymore after 1.3.1 to 1.5.1 patch

Articles.Content:
Hello,

my launcher stopped working, once i updated to 1.5.1, there is nothing in the window of the launcher, just a white background,

and after a moment, it does not respond anymore, and i need to kill it.

Do you have an idea why ? it worked fine on 1.3.1.

I can still launch the game directly, and it works.

Thanks

Edited January 13, 2019 by lk77

5 hours ago, lk77 said:

I can still launch the game directly, and it works.

Keep doing this, the launcher is abandoned for quiet some time and doesn't work properly (or at all).
The surprising part isn't that the launcher stopped working when you went to 1.5, it's that it was still working when you were on 1.3.

well it had worked with news and so on, but recently, the content disappeared from the launcher, i could just launch the game and edit the settings.

i though it was because my version was old.

Okay i will continue to launch it directly then.

Thanks.

Edited January 13, 2019 by lk77
